channel.title: This one had me laughing for a while
channel.description:
Post your favourite jokes... heres mine [QUOTE]An American, a Brit and an Iraqi are in a bar one night having a tea.
The Yankee drinks his tea and suddenly throws his glass in the air,
pulls out a gun and shoots the glass to pieces. He says, "In the
states our glasses are so cheap that we don't need to drink from the
Same one twice."
The Brit obviously impressed by this, drinks his tea, throws his
glass into the air, pulls out his gun and shoots the glass to pieces. He
says,
"In Britain we have so much sand to make the glasses that we don't
Need to drink out of the same glass twice either."
The Iraqi, cool as a cucumber, picks up his tea and drinks it, throws
his glass into the air, pulls out his gun and shoots the American and
the Brit. He says "In Baghdad we have so many Americans and Brits that
We don't need to drink with the same ones twice."[/QUOTE]

item.title: This one had me laughing for a while
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Post your favourite jokes…
heres mine

[QUOTE]An American, a Brit and an Iraqi are in a bar one night having a tea.

The Yankee drinks his tea and suddenly throws his glass in the air,

pulls out a gun and shoots the glass to pieces. He says, "In the

states our glasses are so cheap that we don’t need to drink from the

Same one twice."

The Brit obviously impressed by this, drinks his tea, throws his

glass into the air, pulls out his gun and shoots the glass to pieces. He

says,

"In Britain we have so much sand to make the glasses that we don’t

Need to drink out of the same glass twice either."

The Iraqi, cool as a cucumber, picks up his tea and drinks it, throws

his glass into the air, pulls out his gun and shoots the American and

the Brit. He says "In Baghdad we have so many Americans and Brits that

We don’t need to drink with the same ones twice."[/QUOTE]
